title.en: Eternal Spring of the Silicon Orchid

description.ko: 유기적 성장과 경직된 기술이 융합되어 꽃을 피우는 디지털 생태계의 섬세한 균형을 보여줍니다.
description.en: A delicate balance where organic growth and rigid technology fuse into a blooming digital ecosystem.

prompt: An intricate digital orchid blooming from a circuit-etched copper plate, its petals composed of shifting #89CFF0 iridescent fractal code and translucent glass veins pulsing with #FFB6C1 light. Nature is reclaiming technology through #50C878 mossy circuitry and #4A0E4E binary-coded pollen. 8k, macro photography style, Octane Render. Intricate subsurface scattering on the glass foliage, soft bokeh background, emphasizing the eternal spring of a digital garden.
